species.name: greedent
descriptions: Common throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew through the toughest of berry shells.
It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn’t notice the loss.

abilities.name: cheek-pouch
abilities.effect: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.
